thread.title: Ground News - There will be no parking and a big snow emergency in Windom
thread.title_full: Ground News - There will be no parking and a big snow emergency in Windom

author: Ground News
title: Ground News - There will be no parking and a big snow emergency in Windom
text: The city of Windom is declaring a Snow Emergency effective from 12:01 am on Monday (March 25) until 12 noon on Monday (March 25). That is midnight on Sunday until noon on Monday. During this 12-hour period no vehicles are permitted to be parked on city streets unless the street has been plowed curb to curb. Vehicles may be parked in designated public parking lots.
